Title: There's Always a Back Door
Writer: Stephen Falk (created by), Philippe Iujvidin, Philippe Iujvidin (story editor)
Actors: Chris Geere, Aya Cash, Desmin Borges, Kether Donohue
Plot: Edgar takes Jimmy on a "man date" in an effort to emotionally bond with him while Gretchen discovers some startling news about the new guy she's seeing. Lindsay attempts to make friends at work.
